name: lost in the night
description:
All your life, you are used to being different. But it’s alright; you’ve gotten used to this. Now, you spend your mornings being someone else, working a normal job in a completely normal workplace. And then you spread your wings at night, becoming completely true to yourself.

  • Play as an ordinary person by day in a perfectly ordinary city.
  • Play as a mananggal, roaming the streets at night.
  • Customize your character’s name!
  • Meet and befriend a character. Or maybe even romance them?
  • 2 endings!
